name: cordoba
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a large city in the central part of Argentina: Similar incidents were reported from the western city of Córdoba on February 19 and in the province of Buenos Aires. On Wednesday, state workers in Córdoba stormed and stoned the Municipal Palace.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Córdoba the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Córdoba.After obtaining a law degree from the National University of Córdoba in 1958, Menem began a career as a trade union lawyer in the northwestern city of La Rioja.
